name: CalcChat Reflowed
description: A minimal, distraction-less CalcChat. Includes a modern Bootstrap theme.
additional_info: 2014-03-15 user 184944 * Released v1.02.0. * bootstrap.css: Update to Bootstrap v3.1.1. * bootstrap.css: Use blue .btn-primary button style. * bootstrap.css: Improved css inline comment documentation. 2014-01-31 user 184944 * Released v1.01.1. * style.css: Fixed margins around CalcChat logo. 2013-09-21 user 184944 * label.css: Initial commit. 2013-09-16 user 184944 * Released v1.01.0. * bootstrap.css: Updated to Bootstrap v3.0.0. * style.css: Reduced book content top/bottom margins. * style.css: Fixed header margins and linkable area. 2013-05-03 user 184944 * style.css: Added CC0 license information. 2013-04-21 user 184944 * Released v1.00.1. * style.css: use flexible page width and centering; no longer locked at 980px. 2013-04-15 user 184944 * Released v1.00.0.
